name: Lemon Orzo Chicken Pasta
author: Anonymous
summary: Light and simple. Orzo pasta with lemon juice, chicken, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and spinach. I typically use a rotisserie chicken, since they are typically packed with great flavor already.
ingredients: 1 (.6 ounce) package fresh basil, cut into ribbons
1  lemon, juiced, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook orzo in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes
Drain and transfer to a large bowl
Combine chicken, mozzarella cheese, spinach, basil, olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper with orzo pasta
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate to let flavors mingle, 20 to 30 minutes
